## Checklist (DoD)

- [ ] Small, focused change (ideally <300-500 net lines)
- [ ] CI green: typecheck + lint + test + build
- [ ] Smoke e2e run (if critical flow changed)
- [ ] Manual checklist (2-3 steps + 1 critical flow)
- [ ] Layer rules respected (no invalid deps/cycles)
- [ ] Bundle size gate applied if UI/bundle touched
- [ ] If adding stubs: TODO REMOVE BY + ticket + stub checker passes
